text: Hi Foodtubers, if you are looking for that ultimate showstopper dessert that
can be made ahead

in advance all ready to rock then this is
the one for you today I am going to make

a beautiful banoffee pie really, really
simple, luscious layers of
cream, sweet caramel, bananas and beautiful

buttery biscuit base very simple to
make so it starts off by melting some butter
so while the butter is melting

we need to talk about biscuits I've
gotta pack digestive biscuits about half

a pack up digestive biscuits it's in a
little plastic bag resealable

and now all I'm going to do is bash the
crap outta them until we've got nice fine crumbs
Now it is important that you get nice fine crumbs because when you push this
biscuit base

into the tin, you don't want it to lift so
by having those nice fine crumbs

you'll get a beautiful smooth and even
result
Pour the biscuit crumbs into a bowl, add in the melted butter and mix through
Tumble the buttery biscuits crumbs into a pie tin and press down
Now this is the bit where you can get your hands a little bit dirty
Get them in there and make sure that you have a really nice and compact base so that
nothing lifts
That is pretty much perfect
that's exactly how I want it so this goes into the fridge, it's gonna go in there
for about an hour or if you have less time that is OK too
But while it's in the fridge I'm going to get on with the rest of the ingredients

I've got some bananas we've got some
crunchies we've got some cream
and we've got some caramel. Sweet beautiful banoffee goodness

Pour some cream into a bowl and whisk
until you have soft peaks
and when I chose this bowl to whisk the cream in

I thought would work better but in fact
it is erupting

with cream all over the kitchen counter
so I'll be cleaning that up later but we'll
keep going its fine, it's fine

Now although I have most my cream on
kitchen counter the one thing to remember

is not over whip your cream nobody likes
that grainy cream you wanna make sure
that it's still light and voluptuous but this is pretty much perfect

We're going to chop up the bananas and my secret
weapon
of banoffee pie mass destruction
is a crunchy honeycomb chocolate covered bar so delicious

and so tasty over this banoffee, chop up
some crunchy chocolate covered honeycomb bars
for sprinkling over the top, that's my crunchy sorted and now we need to talk

about that caramel, it starts off with
this beautiful condensed milk and then

we transform it which I've done over here
into
fantastic caramel, you boil bottle the bottle

or the tin of condensed milk for two hours
make sure it's continuously covered
in water otherwise it can explode and when it comes out
what i'm looking for now is a tin opener. When it comes out
what you get left with is the most beautiful, smooth and quite thick caramel that works perfectly for banoffee pie
and now check this out, this is what banoffee pie is all about
Beautiful caramel, and now I have all my ingredients ready
spread the caramel over the biscuit base
Now you don't have to be to particular about how you get your bananas in there

just get them in, nice little kind of
circular motion will

do it quite nicely. Now you may not know
this but
I used to be in a band and when we would do late night recording sessions
our midnight snack was always banoffee pie so I have fond memories of
eating banoffee pie with my bandmates
And this one is exactly how we used to like it.
Spread the whipped cream all over the top the bananas
finish it off with a generous mound of chocolate honeycomb pieces

check this out, a beautiful banoffee pie, all
that's left to do is put this into the fridge

let it set it's ready to rock as soon as
you have people over and you want to
serve it up

if you want the recipe for this, check out
the box below where you can also

and I want you to leave me a comment
and tell me what you think

of my banoffee pie. There's loads more
delicious recipes
just like this one coming up so stay tuned.
